00123 /* Channel modes */
00124 
00125 #define LST_NORMAL   0   
00126 #define LST_NOANSWER 1   
00127 #define LST_BUSYOUT  2   
00128 #define LST_OFFLINE  3   
00130 #define LST_NUMSTATES 4

00160 /* Channel results */
00161 
00162 #define LSR_INIT    0   
00163 #define LSR_OK      1   
00164 #define LSR_RING    2   
00165 #define LSR_ANSWER  3   
00166 #define LSR_LOGIN   4   
00167 #define LSR_USER    5   
00168 #define LSR_FAIL    6   
00169 #define LSR_RELOGON 7   
00170 #define LSR_LOGOUT  8   
00172 #ifdef HAVE_METABBS
00173 #define LSR_METABBS 9   
00174 #define LSR_INTERBBS 10 
00176 #define LSR_NUMRESULTS 11
00177 #else
00178 #define LSR_NUMRESULTS  9
00179 #endif
